name: Sonya Jeror
text: Pizza buffet table was sparse and pizza that was there was dried up, also Don't order the chicken nuggets, hard as a rock and the size of popcorn chicken. Not going back. Enjoyed the beer out of the bottle though.

name: Brenda Bowden
text: It's a shame that the Edgecombe county Pizza Inn in Rocky Mount is so neglected from the owners. It's obviously not as important to them as the one on the Nash county side of Rocky Mount. ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Alvarez
text: The buffet is horrible small selections the pizza is cold not very tasteful the salad bar is terrible everything is very dry! I spent way to much $9.50 a person. That is honestly not worth it. I wouldn't recommend. Just drive about 10 mins to the grandsons buffet and you'll get your money's worth.

name: Ashely C.
text: Food was ok.. waiter was good.. cup was dirty..

name: MANDY BAKER
text: Great food decent service pizza good and fresh when ordered! If you don't like the service or food you can talk with them and they will get it right!

name: Angela Howald
text: The waitress was really nice but the food sucked. We were there during lunch hour and the literally had hardly any food on the little tiny buffet. The waitress said that more pizza would be out in a bit. Yea one pizza came out and it was gone in 2 mins of coming out.

name: David Tyson
text: Pizza Inn has been a popular name in eastern North Carolina for many years. This establish is no different in that regard, but does have its subtle differences

text: The food was excellent as usual and the service was good.  Love talking with the people when I go in there.

text: This place have nasty food it should be shut down.  Please do not order the Lasagna.  It taste like something that is frozen and process in a grocery store.  I can make better lasagna than what they serve to the people.
